text: Ra he mero samudayaharu! Ma yasa (sandesa) bapata timisita dhanasampatti mamgdina, mero puraskara ta kevala allahako jim'mama cha, ra imanavala manisaharula'i ma lakhetana sakdinam, tiniharu aphno palanakartasita saksatakara prapta garnevala chan, tara ma timiharula'i ajnanatapurna karya garirakheka dekhdachu
